GK16udkass_u:588_0: yaḥ punastena tulyamiti tulyārtho vatirvidhīyate tato brāhmaṇena tulyamadhīte brāhmaṇavadadhīte

GK16udkass_u:653: ivādyarthastu upamānasya sādhāraṇadharmavācinā saha “upamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ” (pā. a. 2 / 1 / 55)
GK16udkass_u:657: dvitayalope tvekaprakārā bhavati, sādhāraṇadharmavācina ivādeśca yugapadaprayogāt /

GK16udkass_u:700: atra naraka upamānam, kānanamupameyam, kyacpratyayopāttstvācāraḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:755: yā tu taddhitasāmarthyāvaseyā vatiśabdādavagamyate, sā saṃpūrṇatvātpūrvamuktā /

GK16udkass_u:770: arthānveṣaṇopāyaḥ kaścidupameyaḥ tīkṣṇatvādiḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ upamānopameyabhāvaśceti catuṣṭayamavagamyate /
GK16udkass_u:777_0: tenāyaḥ--śūlika ityatra tritayalope sati taddhitāvaseyā saṃkṣepopamā bhavati ev śvā

GK16udkass_u:779: yadāha sanvidhau bhagavānkātyāyanaḥ--“āśaṅkāyāmacetaneṣūpasaṃkhyānam““na vā tulyakāraṇātvādicchāyā hi pravṛttita upalabdhiri“ti,

GK16udkass_u:909_2: viśeṣe vākyasya paryavasānaṃ tenāyamiṣṭamarthaṃ pratiṣedhavyājena viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati tasmādākṣepaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:927: tena kvavetyayaṃ niṣedha iva natu niṣedha eva /

GK16udkass_u:944: tatra hi samarthakasya samarthakatāvagatihetuṃ vyāptiṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ cānupanyasyārthāntarasyevopanyāsaḥ kriyate /
GK16udkass_u:948: tatra samarthake pūrvamabhihite samarthyasya yatra paścādabhidhānaṃ tatra dvau prakārau bhavataḥ /

GK16udkass_u:956: atra śarvasya sarvalokātiśāyino baṭūbhāvena vṛttimanupapadyamānatayāśaṅkya tatsamarthanāya samarthakaṃ pūrvamevopanyastaṃ “tannāsti yanna kurute“iti /

GK16udkass_u:973: tatrāpi samarthyasamarthakabhāve hiśabdāvagater'thākṣipte ca sati dvaividhyam /

GK16udkass_u:993_0: vinā puruṣakārema phalaṃ paśyata śākhinām“ityāsyāmaprastutapraṃśasāyāṃ viśeṣātsāmānyasya
GK16udkass_u:999: tathāhi “tvayi dṛṣṭa eva tasyā nirvāti mano manobhavajvalitam /

GK16udkass_u:1012: tatra hi vanaśākhināṃ phaladarśanenāprakṛtena daivapradhānena samagrajagadgocaraṃ daivaprādhānyaṃ prakṛtamākṣipyate,
GK16udkass_u:1026: nimittādṛṣṭidṛṣṭibhyāṃ vyatireko dvidhī tu saḥ // UKss_2.6 //

GK16udkass_u:1034: kvaciddhi arthasāmārthyātpratīyamāne upamānopameyabhāve pūrvoktena prakāradvayena vyatirekaḥ khyāpyate,
GK16udkass_u:1039: rāhuṇā pītā dravadravyasyodakādeḥ svagalabilāntarbhāvanaṃ yattadvadātmābhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1041: rāhuṇā pītā dravadravyasyodakādeḥ svagalabilāntarbhāvanaṃ yattadvadātmābhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya ta tathoktaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1044: anayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ svabhāvataḥ saundarye sati nimittavaśādvicchāyatvam /
GK16udkass_u:1046: evamivādyabhāve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvasyātra sāmarthyātpratipattirjayantīmiti ca upamānādupameyasya viśeṣaḥ khyāpitaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1047: tasya ca viśeṣasya khyāpyamānasya nimittamatra na svakaṇṭhenopāttaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:1049: rāhurinduprabhāpāne tathā na samarthaḥ yathā tapaḥsātiśayatvātpārvatyāḥ kṣāmatve iti rāhuto 'pi tapaḥsātiśayatvamupamānādupameyasya viśeṣanimittamatrāvagamyate /
GK16udkass_u:1052: padmaṃ ca niśi niḥśrīkaṃ divācandraṃ ca niṣprabham /

GK16udkass_u:1080: anye kila tapasvinaḥ sātiśayatapovaśātsamullasitacittāḥ santo garvaṃ samudvahanti,
GK16udkass_u:1090: eṣāmapi caturṇāṃ vyatirekāṇāṃ śliṣṭoktiyogyaśabdopādāne sati punarapare pūrvopakrāntenaiva rūpeṇa catvāro bhedā bhavanti /
GK16udkass_u:1093: viśeṣāpādanaṃ yatsyādyvatarekaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // UKss_2.8 //
GK16udkass_u:1095: śliṣṭālaṅkārasamucitaṃ yaduccāraṇaṃ tatsamucitasya śabdasya yadā tantreṇa sadṛśaśabdāntaropādānahetutayā vā prayogo na kriyate api tu pṛthak pṛthaguccāraṇaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:1100: atra śiśiraśobhā upamānaṃ, bhagavatī upameyā, tayośca sādhāraṇo dharmastapoyuktatvaṃ nāma /
GK16udkass_u:1105: tasya ca nimittaṃ māsaikyaṃ dīrdhatvaṃ ca tapasoḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1107: tatra ca vatyādinā anupātte upamānopameyabhāve nimittadarśanena vyatireka udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1108: evamanayā diśāanyadapi śliṣṭoktiyogyaśabdanibandhe sati vyatarekasya pūrvoktanayena bhedatrayamudāhāryam //
GK16udkass_u:1111: jñeyā vibhāvanaivāsau samādhau sulabhe sati // UKss_2.9 //

GK16udkass_u:1113_1: phalabhūtānāṃ kriyaivāvyavahataṃ kāraṇam yatra ca kriyā pratiṣidhyate atha ca kriyāphalasyotpattirupadiśyate
GK16udkass_u:1115: ato viruddhābhāsā bhāvanā utpādanā, tena vibhāvanā /

GK16udkass_u:1177: asyāḥ kare muktāphalākṣamālāyāstadā upamā syāditi saṃbandhaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:1182: tatsajātīyasya padmasya vikāśinaścandrakarāṇāṃ ca yadyādhārādheyabhāvaḥ syāttadātropamānopameyabhāvo bhavediti saṃbhāvanā pravṛttā /
GK16udkass_u:1184: ekasmin khalu padārthe paridṛṣṭe anyasminnanavalokite 'pi tatsajātīyasaṃbhāvanā pravartate /

GK16udkass_u:1217: sa cālaṅkāro bahūnāmalpaśo 'pyupanibadhyamāno yataḥ śobhābaddho bhavati ato bhūyasāmityuktam /
GK16udkass_u:1218: dvayorhi tasyopanibadhyamānasya yāvaccaturguṇatvādirūpatayopanibandho na kṛtaḥ tāvacchobhopetatvaṃ na bhavati /

GK16udkass_u:1225: nanu “mṛṇālahaṃse“tyādāvupavarṇayiṣyamāṇe udāharaṇe mṛṇālādibhya upamānebhyo bāhvādīnāmupameyānāṃ viśeṣakhyāpanādyvatirekālaṅkāreṇa sahṛdayahṛdayāṇyāvarjyante,
GK16udkass_u:1233: atra hi hariprabhṛtīnāṃ trayāṇāmuddiṣṭānāṃ kajjalaruktvasuparṇavāhanatvajalanidhisthatvādayo dharmāḥ krameṇānunirdiṣṭāḥ /

GK16udkass_u:1263: tatra yaḥ siddho dharmaḥ sa guṇaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1267: atra asauprakṛto yor'thastasya ye kriyāguṇā anantaroktalakṣaṇāstadyogātsāmyarūpāvivakṣāyāmapi ivādiśabdapravṛttiravaraddhā /

GK16udkass_u:1269: utprekṣāyāmapi ca yo 'sāvasaḥ aprakṛtastasya ye kriyāguṇāste tasminnaprakṛte vastunyupamānatayānulliṅgite 'pi prakṛte vastunyāsajyante /
GK16udkass_u:1273: na hi vastvantaradharmā vastvantare samāsaktuṃ śakyā ityāśaṅkyoktam---atiśayānviteti /

GK16udkass_u:1288: tatra yā vācyā svakaṇṭhenevādibhirvaktavyā sā ivādībhirucyate /
GK16udkass_u:1293: tatra bhāvābhimānenotprekṣāyāṃ tasyā guṇayogādhyāsena pravṛttāyā udāharaṇam---
GK16udkass_u:1296: asyā mukhe japairhetubhūtaiḥ śyāmikāṅkena patitamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1297: atra japāsaktā bhagavatī arkamavalokayatīti tasyāḥ śaśāṅkasadṛse mukhe śyāmikā saṃjātā /

GK16udkass_u:1299: sā cātra śyāmika śaśilāñchanena śaśena tulyā /

GK16udkass_u:1305: evaṃ cātra śaśasadṛśī śyāmikā caitanyaśūnyatvena bhagavatīvadanamindubhrāntyā na gocarīkaroti /

GK16udkass_u:1446: saṃcāriṇaścautsukyacintāharṣāḥ svaśabdenonmīlitāḥ. svedaromāñcau ca sātvikau svaśabdopāttau /
GK16udkass_u:1454: rasānāṃ bhāvānāṃ ca kāvyaśobhātiśayahetutvāt kiṃ kāvyālaṅkāratvamuta kāvyajīvitatvamiti na

GK16udkass_u:1462: yatra tu tadviruddhatvaṃ tanmūlakalokavyavahāraviruddhatvaṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasabhāvanāmupanibandhe satyūrjasvikāvyaṃ bhavati /

GK16udkass_u:1467: tathā kāmo 'sya vavṛdhe yathā himagireḥ sutām /
GK16udkass_u:1469: atra sakalalokātiśāyino bhagavato 'kṛtavivāhakamārīviṣayatayā haṭhasaṃgrahaḥ śāstrasaṃvidviruddhaḥ pravṛddharāgakāraṇaku upanibaddhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1471: tatra kāmo vavṛdhe ityayaṃ śṛṅgārasya svaśabdaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:1475: apāsya satpathamiti tu mogaḥ, saṃgrahītuṃ pravṛtta iti āṅgako 'nubhāvaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1483_1: yadavagamyate tatparyāyeṇa svakaṇṭhānabhihitamapi sāntareṇa śabdavyāpāreṇāvagamyamānatvāt paryāyoktaṃ vastu /
GK16udkass_u:1490: atra lambālakatvādayaḥ kāryarūpatvāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ gajāsuravadhaṃ vācyavācakavyāpārāspṛṣṭamapi gamayanti /
GK16udkass_u:1491: tena ca tathāvidhayā vicchittyā avagamyamānenārthena te lambālakatvādayor'thā alaṅkiyante /
GK16udkass_u:1496: iha rasabhāvānāṃ śāstrasamayāviruddhena tadviruddhena ca rūpeṇa dvaividhyamuktam /
GK16udkass_u:1497: tatra ye śāstrasamayāviruddhā rasabhāvāḥ te rasabhāvaśabdenātra
GK16udkass_u:1500: teṣāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ tadābhāsānāṃ ca yā vṛttiḥ svāśrayasaṃbandhātmikā tasyāḥ praśame nibadhyamāne samāhitālaṅkāro bhavati /
GK16udkass_u:1501: tatra hi teṣāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ samādhānaṃ samādhiḥ parihāro bhavati /

GK16udkass_u:1505: anyasya rasādyantarasya ye 'nubhāvādayaḥ tairniḥśeṣeṇa śūnyaṃ rūpaṃ yasya tattathoktam /
GK16udkass_u:1506: yatra pūrveṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ vāsanāyā dārḍhyena teṣūpaśānteṣvapi rasādyantarāṇāṃ na svarūpamāvirbhavati,
GK16udkass_u:1510: atha kāntāṃ dṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vibhramācca bhramaṃ bhrūvoḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1516: atra bhagavatā śṛṅgārasya ye 'nubhāvāḥ kāntadṛṣṭyādayasteṣāmavahitthena ākārapracchādanātmakena bhāvena tirodhānaṃ vihitam /
GK16udkass_u:1533: patanaṃ na tayā sārdhamāyāmastu prakaṭyabhūt // UKss_4.*13 //
GK16udkass_u:1543: bhūmeradhogamanādbhūmyāśliṣṭasya pradeśasya bhūmiviviktatvāddhimavataḥ kalpānte āyāmaḥ prakaṭībhūtaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1548: na kevalamṛddhimadvastūdāttaṃ yāvadarthaprāptāvanarthaparihāre codyatānāṃ vipulāśayānāṃ ceṣṭitamapi, taduktam----
GK16udkass_u:1550: na ca vipulāśayaceṣṭite upanibadhyamāne tasya śṛṅgārādirasapratipattihetutvādrasavadalaṅkārānupraveśo 'tra subhaṇaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:1554: yatra ca rasāstātprayeṇāva gamyante tatra teṣāṃ vākyaviśrāntisthānatvena caturvargataditaraprāptiparihāropāyabhūtasthāyibhāvaparipoṣātmanāsvādyamānatvādrasavadalaṅkāro
GK16udkass_u:1561: atra himavataḥ sthairye vākyārthībhūte bhagavato varāhavapuṣastrailokyoddharaṇodyuktasya ceṣṭitaṃ vīrarasapratipattihetubhūtamavāntaravākyārthatvādupalakṣaṇībhūtam /
GK16udkass_u:1569: iha khalu śabdānāmanekārthānāṃ yugapadanekārthavivakṣāyāṃ dvayī gatiḥ arthabhedena tāvacchabdā bhidyante iti bhaṭṭodbhaṭasya siddhāntaḥ /

GK16udkass_u:2340: vastumātrālaṅkāraviṣayasya tu vācyaśaktyāśrayasya vyañjakatvasya pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2341: tathāhi 'cakrābhighātaprasabhājñaye'tyādau vastuviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ kāryavivakṣāpūrvakatvena kāraṇapratītiprasavāt /
GK16udkass_u:2349: upameyasya bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tasyā atyantatiraskṛtavācyamūlatvāt /
GK16udkass_u:2354: yatra cāvivakṣā vācyasya vastuniṣṭhe 'laṅkāraniṣṭhe vā vyañjakatve tatra vyaṅgyarasāderjhagityavagamyamānatvādasaṃlakṣyakramatā draṣṭavyā /
GK16udkass_u:2356: ata eva ca sahṛdayairyatra vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ tatraiva vastvalaṅkārayoḥ pratīyamānayorvācyena saha kramavyavahāraḥ pravartitor'thaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvanirityuktaṃ,
GK16udkass_u:2358: yatra ca vācyasyāvavakṣā pūrvamuktā “rāmo 'smī'ti 'suvarṇapuṣpā'miti ca tatra vayamadhikāropetaprastutārthānubandhivastūpanibandhādaprastutapraśaṃsābhedatvameva nyāyyaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16udkass_u:2360: yattu pūrvaparyāyoktabhedatvaṃ 'snigdhaśyāmalakāntī'tyādau rāmādīnāṃ śabdānāmabhihitaṃ tadupakramamātrarūpatayā draṣṭavyam /
GK16udkass_u:2362: yatra khalu vācyavivakṣāpūrvakatvena arthāntaraṃ pratīyate 'cakrābhighāte'tyādāvudāharaṇacatuṣṭaye tatra paryāyoktabhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2368: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktamūle 'laṅkāraikaniyate vācyaśaktimūle ca rasādiviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaikarūpatvam /
GK16udkass_u:2369: vastvalaṅkāraviṣaye tu vācyaśaktimūle vyañjakatve pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvibhedatā /
GK16udkass_u:2373: yatra ca vivakṣitatvaṃ tatra vācyasya svataḥsaṃbhavitvātprauḍhoktimātraniṣpāditaśarīratvācca dvaividhyam /
GK16udkass_u:2375: ete cāṣṭau bhedā vācyasya yatrāvivakṣā tadviṣayābhyāṃ pūrvoditābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhe dābhyāṃ saṃkalitāḥ santo daśa saṃpadyante /
GK16udkass_u:2376: eta eva tu padavākyaprakāśyatayā dvaiguṇyaṃ bhajamānā viṃśatirbhavti /
GK16udkass_u:2380: yathā ca pradhānabhūte vyaṅgye eṣā vyañjakatā rviśatividhā bhavati,
GK16udkass_u:2390: vastvalaṅkāravācye dhvanau pratyekaṃ vācyaṃ vivakṣyamavivakṣyaṃ ceti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16udkass_u:2392: śabdaśaktirasāspada iti vācyakaśaktasamāśrayaṃ rasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ ca vyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16udkass_u:2397: kuśāgrīyabuddhīnāṃ hi diṅbhātra evopadarśite sati buddhivallī pratānaśatairnānādigvayāpitvena vistāramāsādayatīti //
